resources.string: • Available as both an on-premise and hosted solution
• Zero footprint, agentless app for iOS and Android
• Leverages FIPS 140–2 crypto and TLS 1.2 encryption
• Supports PKI Credential based multi-factor authentication
• Virtual mobile devices are accessible from any Android or iOS device
• Ensure compliance by keeping apps and data secure in the data center
• Enjoy user adoption by eliminating the need for intrusive agents and ‘big brother’ policies
• Enterprise identity support with AD/LDAP integration
• Delegated admin privileges for flexible platform management
• Supports enterprise-class storage integration, including NAS and SAN storage
• Centralized control and management of the mobile experience
• Supports third-party monitoring and management tools
• Single virtual OS to develop, test, and support
• Rich sensor integration, including screen orientation, GPS, Bluetooth, and more
• Dynamic H.264 encoding and audio/video optimizations for improved multimedia experience

Our Virtual Mobile Infrastructure (VMI) platform streams any mobile app to any device. All the apps run on servers in the secure data center, never leaving data or applications at rest on the physical end point. Even if your device is lost, data and apps can\'t be compromised.
• Compute, memory, and storage for on-premise solutions vary based on the specific needs of each organization
• Contact Hypori to estimate on-premise requirements and costs
Hypori is available as both and on-premise and hosted solution. Compute, memory, and storage for on-premise solutions vary based on the specific needs of each organization.

Intelligent Waves LLC is a service-disabled, Veteran Owned Small business that specializes in providing information technology (IT) and communications support to a wide variety of U.S. government customers. We provide cutting edge IT Networking and Services design, execution, and sustainment.

Since 2006, Intelligent Waves LLC has been providing information technology (IT) and communications support to a wide variety of U.S. government customers. Our boots on the ground experience—along with our technical expertise—enables us to identify, document, and develop mission-critical IT and communications solutions.
Enterprise Level of Concern with Potential Mobile Security Issues
• Hypori enables secure, managed access to controlled enterprise resources via BYOD or uncontrolled commercial devices.
The Hypori Client is a mobile thin client app developed and available on both Android and iOS platforms that provides access to the Hypori Device.

The Hypori Virtual Mobile Device is a virtual mobile platform that runs on a server. It functions just like a physical smartphone or tablet, except the operating system, data, and apps reside and run on a server instead of a physical device.
The Hypori Admin Console is a web application that can be used to monitor and configure the Hypori platform, including Hypori servers, virtual devices, and users.

Hypori by Intelligent Waves represents a new and comprehensive approach to Enterprise Mobility Management and Mobile Device Management. Hypori virtualizes the entire mobile experience – moving everything that matters into a managed and secure environment.
Hypori mitigates the risk of data at rest from both mobile Android and iOS platforms.
Want to try Hypori for free for 30 days? Press the button below to download the app and start!
Hypori is already being adopted by customers such as the Department of Homeland Security and the U.S. Special Operations Command.
Hypori enables secure, managed access to controlled enterprise resources via BYOD or uncontrolled commercial devices.
• Hypori is the only NSA CSfC approved virtual smartphone solution.

Enterprises are challenged with protecting data, applications and users, and securing the end point has become a never ending arms race. Inability to win this battle is preventing the full realization of the benefits of mobility.
Hypori moves this battlefield from the unsecure difficult to control end point to the secure and managed cloud.
Want to try Hypori for free for 30 days? Press the button with your corresponding Operating System below!
Securing the end point has become a never ending arms race and the inability to win this battle is preventing the full realization of the benefits of mobility.
Enterprises are challenged with protecting data, applications and users without stifling innovation, delaying enterprise mobility rollouts or compromising end user adoption.
Provide a single, centralized mobile OS version on persistent virtual mobile devices. Simplify the development, deployment, testing, and support of apps.
Virtualize the entire mobile experience, leaving no data or apps at rest on physical mobile endpoints. Risks associated with malware, reverse engineering, and theft are eliminated.

The mobile thin client provides access to the virtual mobile environment without an intrusive agent. Drive adoption and eliminate liability from big brother policies. Easily onboard contractors with mobile access.
Hypori’s class-leading Virtual Mobile Infrastructure platform delivers a managed and secure environment to power your critical Mobility / BYOD program
Provide secure communications between the device and enterprise resources. Integrates with existing Mobile Device Management and directory service capabilities.
Establish and maintain full control of access to all enterprise resources and data. Enforces absolute control of what apps are allowed.
Use any Android or iOS end User device to access enterprise resources. Leverage any app that runs in an Android environment.
Eliminate any concerns about data at rest on the mobile device (it never resides there). Achieve all security and compliance requirements for data loss prevention.
